subject: Sports Injuries
Football
lead_paragraph: Philip Rivers of the Chargers has had 47 turnovers in 2011 and 2012, but unlike quarterback Mark Sanchez of the Jets, he has not been benched.
snippet: Philip Rivers of the Chargers has had 47 turnovers in 2011 and 2012, but unlike quarterback Mark Sanchez of the Jets, he has not been benched.
